page.title: 11Gardens in Darras Hall
page.content: {Gardens}are an important part of the appeal of the estate.There are many mature trees and shrubs.Typical reasons for having a garden include decoration,pets,relaxation, growing fruit and vegetables and for children to play in. {Trees..}silver birch,beech,hawthorn, horse chestnut,conifers,holly,laurel, poplar,laburnum,white beam, weeping willow,larch and mountain ash. {Bushes..}rhododendron,cotoneaster, weigelia,buddlia,broom,roses,hawthorn {Bedding Plants-}pansies,aubretia,geum, lilac,phlox,mimulus,honeysuckle,poppy, canterbury bells,primulus,lupins. {Foods..}apples,rhubarb,strawberries, raspberries,gooseberries:mint,chives, thyme,sage,parsley:onions,potatoes, carrots,runner beans,courgettes,peas, beetroot,turnips,lettuce and radishes.
